section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The purpose clause initially defines the venture's scope as IT development and back-office maintenance for a medical service. However, the added sentence grants BorrowMoney.com, Inc. unilateral authority to change the purpose at any time. This contradicts the initial definition and creates uncertainty, as JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's involvement is predicated on the original purpose. A drastic change could render their investment or expertise irrelevant and negatively impact their interest in the joint venture.

section: Duties of Members may be amended, from time to time, by decision of the Members, provided that the Members' interests are not affected except with the unanimous consent of the Members.
explanation: This section outlines that member duties may be amended from time to time by the decision of the members. This section also stipulates that if interests are affected then unamious consent is required. Later in the docuement it is written 'This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.' This is contradictory.

section: Any vote required by the Members will be determined such that each Member receives one vote, however, BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote will carry twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote.
explanation: The section that says 'however, BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote will carry twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote' is an inconsistency. Since BorrowMoney.com, inc's vote carries twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote, then the statement that says, 'each Member receives one vote' is contradictory.
